name: anthonyjamespearson-com
description: Node package for the repository as a whole

scripts.synth: npm run build:all && cdk synth --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=anthonyjamespearson.com
scripts.diff: npm run build:all && cdk diff --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=anthonyjamespearson.com
scripts.deploy:infra: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=anthonyjamespearson.com --require-approval never
scripts.deploy: npm run build:all && cdk deploy --app "dotnet run --project infrastructure/src/Infrastructure/Infrastructure.csproj" --context name=anthonyjamespearson.com
scripts.deploy:full: npm run deploy:infra && npm run build:website && npm run deploy:infra
